main event: On the night of 22 August 1954, a point of light moving rapidly across the sky was observed in Savannah Beach, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 15 minutes,The object appeared to have no apparent shape and was described as a pale yellowish-white color,The object first appeared as a dim yellowish glow that increased to a bright glow, The sighting involved only one observer, who was a reliable witness, The object changed course from NNW to W and then headed South before fading out of view.
sighted object: a point of light in the sky
witness description: A reliable witness with high school education and some college experience.
